justification: “As a measure for bias in the decision task, we first calculated the mean bias (SDT criterion; see Methods) of each participant for each bias manipulation…”
“As a measure of perceptual shifts, we calculated the mean reproduction error in the reproduction task (reproduction length – target length) of each participant…”
